latex: Let $f(n)=\displaystyle\sum_{k=1}^n \dfrac{1}{k}$.  Then there exists constants $\gamma$, $c$, and $d$ such that \[f(n)=\ln(x)+\gamma+\dfrac{c}{n}+\dfrac{d}{n^2}+O\left(\dfrac{1}{n^3}\right),\] where the $O\left(\dfrac{1}{n^3}\right)$ means terms of order $\dfrac{1}{n^3}$ or lower.  Compute the ordered pair $(c,d)$.
